alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 5:19PM CDT until June 03 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... West central Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 519 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stonewall to 14 miles southeast of Shreveport to 6 miles southwest of Haughton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Multiple trees and power lines have been downed across Shreveport from these storms. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Stonewall, Carmel, Frierson, Caspiana, Taylortown, Lake Bistineau South, Elm Grove, Kingston, Loggy Bayou, Koran, Ninock, Crichton, Keithville, Robson, Mc Dade and Sligo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; De Soto; Red River
